about_the_game:
An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD GRAPHICS and realistic-looking characters.
Tony and his two assistants head to a meeting downtown, determined to secure a new office space for the company.
Will they find a way to sway the current owner in their favor?

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Tony and embark on his wild Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single guy.

EPISODE 8

Tony has been yearning for a downtown office building for a while without any luck. The few available are all under long-term contracts. So, when his business partner Gavin announces he is moving to the East Coast, Tony sees a chance to snatch up the vacated space.

But Tony is not the only one interested, and Gavin is a tough negotiator. After numerous back-and-forth emails fail to secure the deal, Tony and his two assistants arrange a face-to-face meeting, determined to sway Gavin in their favor.

Will they find a way to secure the rental contract?
Will Gavin yield to their unconventional tactics?

Follow Tony’s Sex Adventure and find out!

FEATURES

- HD renders
- Image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains gay sex scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
